Title: Silverlight Behaviors Toolkit
Description: Silverlight Behaviors toolkit provides a way to attach standard rich UI behaviors(layout managers, buttons, radio, checkboxes...) on Silverlight UIElements. This is inspired from the Ajax Control Toolkit, and is made to work with ASP.Net Ajax.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Silverlight Behaviors toolkit provides a way to attach standard rich UI behaviors(layout managers, buttons, radio, checkboxes...) on Silverlight UIElements. This is inspired from the Ajax Control Toolkit, and is made to work with ASP.Net Ajax.


Please understand that this project is still beta, and that code that runs today is suceptible to be broken in next releases.

To see demos of Silverlight Behaviors toolkit running, click here: Demos
